Row.Text: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Patronage[ENDCOLOR] enhances the benefits of City-State friendship.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adopting Patronage will cause [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence with City-States to degrade 25% slower than normal. Unlocks building the Forbidden Palace.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adopting all policies in the Patronage tree will cause all [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Allied[ENDCOLOR] City-States to occasionally gift you [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] Great People. City States that are protected by you grant you +1 [ICON_INFLUENCE] influence per turn in addition to a 10% increase to great person generation in your empire.
